title: Social Media-Based Learning Design for ESP (English for Specific Purposes) in Medicine and Health Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Aims to adapt to English-language lecture environments aligned with EHEA (European Higher Education Area) standards. Requires enhanced interaction via social media and virtual tools to overcome limitations of traditional lecture-based instruction.

learning_goals: Accurately utilize core academic terminology used in medical/health sciences contexts with over 80% proficiency
Contribute at least two professional opinions weekly in collaborative discussions with peer learners via Facebook groups and blogs
Perform over 90% of real-time medical case analysis Q&A using MSN Messenger-like tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
